hero.title: Unlocking Prosperity
hero.subtitle: Building the Future
hero.description: Pioneering the dual ecosystem of Real Estate Development and High-Tech Innovation (Semiconductors & CNC).

story.title: WELCOME
story.salutation: Dear Valued Customers, Partners, and Investors,
story.p1: Adventure Ocean was established with the ambition to create pioneering value through a dual ecosystem: combining Resort & Commercial Real Estate with High-Tech (Semiconductors & CNC). This strategic foundation is designed to deliver long-term and sustainable growth.
story.p2: Guided by Integrity and Transparency, we are committed to strict legal compliance in every project, always prioritizing our partners' interests. Adventure Ocean views you not merely as clients, but as companions on our journey toward a "vast ocean" of opportunity and prosperity.
story.closing: Thank you for your continued trust and partnership.

servicesSection.title: Service Pillars
servicesSection.description: A comprehensive ecosystem combining Real Estate and High-Tech, creating sustainable value.

hero.title: Dual Ecosystem Excellence
hero.description: Bridging the serenity of luxury living with the precision of high-tech innovation. We engineer value across four strategic pillars.

sidebar.title: Service Pillars
sidebar.consultationDesc: Our experts are ready to discuss your investment or partnership needs.

realEstate.title: Real Estate Development & Business
realEstate.summary: Possessing prime land banks and pioneering breakthrough resort/commercial business models for sustainable growth.

subServices.title: Resort & Tourism Real Estate
subServices.description: Developing, brokering, and distributing coastal villas, condotels, and luxury resort complexes.

subServices.title: Commercial Projects
subServices.description: Investing in, developing, and managing shopping malls and commercial office spaces for lease.

subServices.title: Support Services
subServices.description: Operational management of resorts and commercial centers; Consultancy for high-end real estate transfers.

highlight.label: Key Highlights
highlight.text: Possessing prime land banks and pioneering breakthrough resort and commercial business models.

highTech.title: High-Tech & CNC Semiconductors
highTech.summary: Pioneering investment in Semiconductor supply chain (OSAT) and Precision Mechanical Technology (CNC) for supporting industries.

subServices.title: Semiconductor Research & Manufacturing
subServices.description: Investing in the supply chain for components, equipment, and Semiconductor solutions.

subServices.title: CNC Technology
subServices.description: Developing and providing CNC (Computer Numerical Control) solutions and high-precision machining machinery.

subServices.title: Technology Application
subServices.description: Deploying integrated Smart City and Smart Home solutions within the Group's real estate projects.

subServices.title: Venture Capital
subServices.description: Identifying and investing in high-growth Tech Startups and projects.

infrastructure.title: Industrial Park & Cluster Infrastructure Development
infrastructure.summary: Creating a solid launchpad for corporate prosperity through comprehensive, modern industrial park infrastructure and strategic locations.

vision.label: Vision
vision.text: Creating a solid launchpad for corporate prosperity through comprehensive, modern infrastructure solutions in strategic locations.

goal.label: Goal
goal.text: Optimizing operational costs, connecting with global supply chains, and fostering local economic development.

consulting.title: Investment & Legal Consulting
consulting.summary: Providing full-package solutions, valuation, and in-depth legal consulting for domestic and international investors.

subServices.title: Full-package solutions
subServices.description: Providing solutions for investors seeking to develop Real Estate projects in Vietnam.

subServices.title: Due Diligence
subServices.description: Valuation, planning verification, and legal due diligence for Real Estate projects.

subServices.title: Intellectual Property
subServices.description: Consulting on legal procedures related to Real Estate and Technology Intellectual Property.

synergy.title: Ecosystem Synergy
synergy.description: Our dual pillars are not isolated; they are interconnected engines of growth. Adventure Ocean leverages the stability of Real Estate to fuel the innovation of High-Tech, creating a self-sustaining cycle of value.

left.title: Foundational Asset
left.desc: Real Estate provides the physical infrastructure (Industrial Parks) and financial capital stability required for long-term tech investment.

right.title: Innovation Engine
right.desc: High-Tech manufacturing brings smart solutions to our properties and drives industrial land value appreciation through employment and infrastructure demands.

projects.metaDescription: Adventure Ocean proudly presents a collection of iconic projects.

hero.title: BUILDING LEGACIES - STEPPING INTO THE FUTURE
hero.description: Adventure Ocean proudly presents a collection of iconic projects, where exquisite architecture meets majestic nature and pioneering technology. Each structure is a sustainable legacy, creating prosperous value for the community and investors.

featured.title: Featured Projects
featured.description: Masterpiece collection where architecture meets innovation

seaFlower.title: Sea Flower Resort
seaFlower.description: A world-class coastal resort paradise, where the pristine beauty of the ocean blends with 5-star amenities. Experience green living and comprehensive healthcare services.

songXanh.title: Song Xanh Village
songXanh.description: Classic European architecture in the heart of tropical nature. Song Xanh Village offers an elite lifestyle with isolated riverside villas and absolute security.

maiVang.title: Golden Ochna Garden
maiVang.description: A unique cultural preservation project honoring the traditional yellow apricot blossom. A serene space imbued with the Vietnamese soul, where heritage values are preserved and promoted.

sunrise.title: Sunrise Industrial Park
sunrise.description: Smart green industrial park with synchronized infrastructure. An ideal destination for high-tech corporations with comprehensive logistics solutions and a sustainable ecosystem.

cta.title: Ready to Invest in the Future?
cta.description: Download our detailed project portfolio or schedule a consultation with our investment experts to explore opportunities.

testimonial.quote: In every project we undertake, we see beyond the physical structures and technological achievements. We envision communities thriving, industries advancing, and a nation growing stronger through innovation and sustainable development.

cta.title: Ready to Collaborate?
cta.description: Contact us today to begin your journey of prosperous investment with Adventure Ocean.

blog.description: Latest news and insights from Adventure Ocean
blog.headerSubtitle: Staying ahead of the curve in Real Estate development and High-Tech innovation.

hero.title:
Pioneering the Future
of Value Creation
hero.description: Adventure Ocean is a multi-disciplinary corporation bridging the gap between luxury real estate and high-tech innovation.

about.visionQuote: In every project we undertake, we see beyond the physical structures and technological achievements. We envision communities thriving, industries advancing, and a nation growing stronger through innovation and sustainable development.

vision.title: VISION
vision.content: To become a leading regional conglomerate, pioneering the trend of integrated investment in High-Value Real Estate and Strategic Technology, serving as a trusted bridge connecting investors to "blue oceans" of breakthrough profitability.

customers.title: For Customers & Investors
customers.content: To deliver ideal living and resort solutions alongside secure, transparent investment opportunities, while unlocking access to high-potential technology projects.

partners.title: For Partners
partners.content: To foster mutual growth and share sustainable benefits, grounded in a foundation of innovation and integrity.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: Ensuring legal transparency and upholding every commitment in both Real Estate and Technology.

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.content: Providing wholehearted consulting and prioritizing customer interests above all.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Possessing strategic foresight to embrace upcoming trends in urban planning and technology.

speed.title: Speed
speed.content: Ensuring agility in transactions and rapid technology adoption.
